domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse You should resign and apologize for your stereotypical bs! Of my 7 black adult children, none smoke, drink or do drug. A friend of 1 of my sons died from #COVID19 he didn’t smoke, drink of do drugs. A family friend, a nurse also died from #COVID19 he didn’t do any of the 3 either
